title: The Writer's Almanac for Sunday, January 23, 2022
description: For every poet it is always morning in the world… the fate of poetry is to fall in love with the world, in spite of History." -- poet Derek Walcott, born on this day 1930.
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
